ki mere chehre pe tera naam na padh le koi…

st: Mere sukun ko laota de koi
s:
Mere sukun ko laota de koi
In larazte honto se muskura de koi
Bahut derd sama rakha is sine me
Dawa bankar is derd ko mita de koi
Mujhe bhi muskurane ki tamanna hai bahut
Is gham k samundar me khushyan la de koi
Tanha chalte chalte ab thak gaya hun main
Safar k is tanhayi ko akar mita de koi
Jine k liye mere pas yaadon k siwa kuch nahi
Marne k liye apni muhabbat ka sahara de de koi

st: 1.Aya dour ab Naye AshiQ Ka
s:
1.Aya dour ab Naye AshiQ Ka
purane Ashiqo ne azamana chaha?
batao kya kr sakte ho tum apni mehbooba k liye?
hum ne tho Qurbaan kr di thi Jaan un k liye
Sun k sawal New Ashiq hass pada
bola jo dard sahaa hai tumne uska waqt kam tha
bola hum ne tho guzari dard bari zindagi aisi
lo sunatha hoon Aap beethi apni
un k liye my apni sari Umar guzar di
khoon k Asansu the jo rukne k intezar me guzaari
isi dauraan chali gayi benaayeei hamari
magar wo ab tak b lout k na ayi
2.Hum wo Ashiq hai
jo Surath se nahi
Sirath se pyar krthe hai,
jis par jaan hum apni nishawar krthe hai,
kehne ko tho sabi Ashiq kehte hai,
Magar Hum wo Ashiq hai
jo apni mehboob ki izaat k khatir
hum apni Mohbbt b chupa sakte hai.
3.Ye Ashiq ki hai nayi daastan,
sun k sabi log hogaye pareshaan,
mohabt ki ladayi me jeet hi gaya tha wo,
apni mehbooba ko gar le aya tha wo,
khusi se tho ek din beet gaya,
Dusre hi din wo Late bangaya,
sare barathi hogaye pareshaan,
sun k NauShah pahunch gaya kabrastaan..
4.Ashiq ka tho ab Khoon hogaya
sun k dushman khush hogaya
goan k ladkiya ka behaal hogaya
rothe rothe keh rahi hai
Hye ye kya hogaya
ek thu hi tha apna jo aj jhuda hogaya
sun k dhusman khush hogaya
bola le my agaya
sun kr ladkiya rone lagi
apne yaar ko pukaar ne lagi
Khuda ko ye manzoor na hua
beja ek naye Ashiq ko
jo Athe hi bola
ruk jao meri jaan
mat ho hayeraan
khudha ne AZMAYA tum ko kr k pareshaan
ab hum baga dhenge sare shaitaan
5.Ashiq ye tumara hai,
dil jis pe hara hai,
Kaho jo b kehna hai,
Sunne jo ye Ashiq behta hai.
Chedo jitna chedna hai,
satao jitna satana hai,
magar fir b ye Ashiq
Tum pe hi martha hai.
6.Ek seek hum thume sikha denge
apna exprience tumhe batha denge
Na karna mohabbt haseeno se
ye dil badi asani se tod dhenge
keh k dost ye Ashiq ka
Sath badi asani se shod denge
inki batho pr na krna wishwaas
ya hi aksar doka dejayenge
kar k barosa inpar apne hi
pair pr hum khulhadi marlenghe
7.Na bansaka mohbbat ka rishta hamara
bikar gaya dil jo tha armaano bara
bangaya ek naya rishta unse hamara
keh k dosti sath choda hamara
shayad upar wale ko na manzoor tha milan hamara
isliye tootwadiya Ashiyana hamara
Na krna mohabbt aye dost shadi se pehle
warna bn k rehjaoge devdaas mouth se pehle
8.Shayro ki mehfil me aya hai naam hamara,
krthe jb shayari tho atha hai sabi ki wah wah ka ishara
pr usme koyi samjtha nahi dookuon ki dastaan hamara
9.Chere se wo yun nakab atane ko ktrathe gaye
batho hi bhato me betaabi badathe gaye
hum taras gaye dekne wo haseen chera-e-munavr
itni thi quaish k wo tukra k chale gaye
itna gehra sadma pahuncha is nadaan dil ko
bikre armano ko simaet na sake
huwa qudart ka karishma aisa
dekane wo chera
hame beauty parlour kolna padha
fir wo naqab hatana hi tha hame
tho chumne ka mouka mil gaya. 
10.Clas me jab b unka zikar atha hai!
Answr paper pr kalam chalna shuru hojatha hai,
lik dhethe hai dastaan e mohabat,
pr kambkt wo teachr tak pahunch jata hai.
11.Ek haseena pe ye dil atka,
husn jiska aftab sa chamka!
Ankhen hai inki payari,
jispe lut gayi sari umr hamari,
daek kr hame jb ye muskuraye.
sabi gum humne bhoolaye,
jisko dekne ki kwaish ho 1bar
souncho Agar wo bn jaye Malika e AshiQ ek baar
bus itni si ilteja krthe hai hum
ruswa na hona kabhi hum se Tum
12.Ek haseen ladki ne hame diwana banaya!
Krna tha use dillagi isiliye hame istemaal me laya!
Wo janthi na thi hum ek nazuk Dil insaan hai
Dhe baite Dil ab baki jism bejaan hai
13.Dil thod diya app ne humara
ab ek akri ehsaan kardo
Mohabbat me Paani na sahi
Zehar hi peela dho
14.Jaane Aap Apne Hai
Yea Begana Hai
Par Accha Lagta Hai,
Do Pal Apke Saath Bitana,
Rista Hai Jaane Kya Apse Mera,
Par Khuaabo Me Apka Aana, Accha Lagta Hai,
Kehne Ko Jb B Ye Socha Mene
Ki Ap Haan Keh Degi Ab
Lekin Apka Na Keh Jaana Accha Lagta Hai,
Yaqn Nahi He Sayad Aapko Ki
Gam Mohabbat Me Hi Milte He,
Phir B Dil Ka Muskuraana Accha Lagta Hai,
Nazroo K Milane Se Hi Dil Ki Tabahi Suru Hoti Hai,
Phir B Apse Nazre Milana Accha Lagta Hai,
Nahi Pata Ki App Hame Pyaar Karte B Hai Ya Nahi,
Phir B Apke Khayalo Me Kho Jaana Accha Lagta Hai
15.POETRY 4 BRIDE
Sehre ko wo saja k aye,
maa baap ki kushiyun ko lehrate aye,
gar ko kushiyan lejane aye!
Huzoor ki sunnath ko ammal krne aye
kasam ye kuch kane aye!
Nibayenge bhabi ka sath jb tak ye rooh na jaye!
Dua tho sabki ye lene aye,
kali na jaye koyi misri badam ye laye!
Bhai behno ki kushi ka koyi pata nai
sab ko kushi ye lekar aye!
Bade buzurgaon ki ho jb dua hum pr.
Rahenge saath hum zindagi br.
Ye kehne aye!
16.Hum ne ek aisi ladki se mohabbt ki hai,
jo thodi nahi bahot sharmili hai,
Hum ne jb b unhe prapose kiya,
Unhone simple sa ek jawab diya!
Jo muje na samaj Aya?
Wo kehte hai k unke parents ki marzi!
Tab myne kaha k miya bivi razi tho
kya karinge parents aur Qazi! 
17.Hamare sabr ka wo imtihan leti gayi,
humne ki unse mohabt jo uski saza likthi gayi,
ye na kehti k ye saza hai tumari,
Aur kabi na sounchti kya hogi iski majboori,
wo Agar samjthi hai k hum un k layaq nahi,
tho fir saaf saaf Wo kyun kehti nahi.
K hum us k qaabil nahi.
18.Hum ne tho unki or dosti ka hath badaya tha
par unhone hamari naadani ka galat istemal utaya
bana diya hame jo hm kabi na chahte the
band diya hame bhai k rishte me
jo charane wale dage se
is se bad kr gam kya hoga
jo sirf saha jaye unki yado se
Wo keh b diye tho kya hoga
wahi hoga jo mazoor e Qudha chahe
19.Tod diya dosti ka rishta hamara
jo tha sadiyo purana
Shayad unhe mil gaya koyi aur yara
Jane dho yaro ye galati hamari hi hogi
jo lagayi thi aas wo Sunehri na hogi
unhe pasand hoga koyi aur jo humse smart hoga
pr unhe abi tak pata nhi k dil se wo gareeb hoga
Hm ab aur na chahenge aur na kisi ko dil deynge
ye huyi thi humse galti
jo ab sudhaar lenge
na dhenge ye dil ab kisi ko
aur na pachtayenge kabi
jo huyi hai katha na dhuarayenge kabi.
20.Jo na kehni thi bhat wo kehgaye,
Jo kiye the wade wo mukar gaye,
wo kya jane zakm kitni chot dega,
ye tho unhe tab pata chalega,
jab unka koyi doka de jayega!

st: Hi guys…thanks for yr replies…it felt good to hear
s:
Hi guys…thanks for yr replies…it felt good to hear
from u…have written a few more…will share them
from time to time…here’s another one….

Hum to lut gaye unki ek muskaan pe,
Adayein dekhkar phas gaye mohabbat mein,
Gar khuda bhi punche qayamat pe,
To keh denge ki mit gaye sharafat mein.

st: um na maanu magar haqiqat hai
s:
um na maanu magar haqiqat hai
Ishq insaan ki zarorat hai
Un ki mehfil mein baith ker daikho
Zindagi kitni khoobsurat hai…

st: Agar pyar nahi karna ho to dil ko na lagana
s:
Agar pyar nahi karna ho to dil ko na lagana
Apna chain kho kar khud ko na rulana
Jis dil ko pyar karna na usko tod dena
Yeh aaj ka nahi hai kissa hai purana
Ulfat me aaj dekho koi kya se kua bana hai ?
Koi ashq hai bahata koi ban gaya diwana
Kuch logo ne pyar ko aise badnam kar diya
Kyu karte ho pyar jab aata nahi nibhana
Kuch ladke ladkiyan pyar ko kyu khel hai samjhte ?
“SAGAR” ko bata do yeh kyu karta hai zamana…..

st: Pyar ka matlab nahi koi sheher me
s:
Pyar ka matlab nahi koi sheher me
mehboob badal jaate hain har semister me
kyu diye jalaye hum gali k baadastoor
aag lagi hai jab apne hi ghar me
kyu pyaar usi se hame bepanaah
meri kimat nahi koi jiski nazar me
khudgarz ho gaya insaan is hawa me
beh gaye sab is leher me
maa tu kyu aansu bahati hai khule me
wo taseer nahi ab doodh k asar me
teri aankh me nami kyu hai dost
kya fir koi haadsa hua safar me

st: Tumhari is ada ka kya jawab du,
s:
Tumhari is ada ka kya jawab du,
Apne dost ko kya uphar du,
Koi acha sa phool hota to mali se mangwate,
Jo khud gulab hai usko kya gulab du… 
Rab ne jab tujhe banaya hoga
Ek surur uske dil mein aya hoga,
Sochta hoga kya doonga tohfe mein tujhe,
Tab usne mujhe banaya hoga. 
Kaash ham SMS hote,
Ek click mein tumhare paas hote,
Bhale tum hame delete kar dete,
Par kuch pal ke liye ham tumhara ehsas to hote…! 
Tanhaion me unko hi yaad karte hain,
Wo salamt rahe yahi fariyad karte hai,
Ham unke hi mohabbt ka intzar karte hai,
Unko kya pata hum unse kitna pyaar karte hai.
Ek din hamare annsoon humse pooch baithe,
humey roz -roz kyon bulate ho,
Humne kaha hum yaad to unhe karte hain tum kyon chale aate ho. 
Har phool ki ajab kahani hai,
chup rehna bhi pyar ki nishani hai,
kahin koi zakhm nai phir bhi kyun dard ka ehsas hai,
lagta hai dil ka ek tukda aaj bhi uske paas hai 
Kismat par aitbar kisko hai,
Mil jaye khushi inkaar kisko hai,
Kuch majburian hain mere dost,
Warna judai se pyaar kisko hai 
Kal mila waqt to zulfein teri suljha doonga,
Aaaj uljha hoon zara waqt ko sulajhane mein,
Yun to sulajh jatee hain uljhi zulfein,
Umar kat jati hai waqt ko sulajhane mein. 
darte hai aag se kahi jal na jaye
darte hai khwab se kahin toot na jaye
lekin sabse ziyada darte hai aapse
kahin aap hume bhool na jaye..

st: Lag Jane Do Mujhe Sine Se
s:
Lag Jane Do Mujhe Sine Se
K Muhabbat Ki Ab Barish Hogi
Mit Jane Do Ye Fasle Hamari Chahat Ke,
Ke Muhabbat Ki Ab Barish Hogi
Ye Shab O Kamar Ye Asman O Tare
Sare Dekh Rahe Hain
Bas Jao Meri Ruh Me Hamesha K Liye
Ke Muhabbat Ki Ab Barish Hogi
Shab E Gham Ka Ye Pal Main
Ji Raha Hun Khushi Se
Tum Lao Kar Aao Ya Na Aao
Ke Muhabbat Ki Ab Barish Hogi
Dekh Legi Ye Duniya Meri
Muhabbat Ki Si Gahrayi Ko
Ho Jane Do Mjhe Fana Muhbt Ki
Tapish Me K Mhbt Ki Ab Barish Hogi
Ji Me Ata Hai Ki Tujhe Itna Pyar Karu
K Tujhe Koi Aur Chahat Na Ho
Bhar Lo Apni Banho Me Mil Jane Do In Sanso Ko
K Muhbt Ki Ab Barish Hogi
Apka Dost

st: Kiya Baat Kahon Un Ankhoon Ke
s:
Kiya Baat Kahon Un Ankhoon Ke
Jin Ankhoon Pey Main Marti Hoon 
Woh Ankhain Jheel Se Ankhain Hain
Jin Main Doob Key Rooz Ubharti Hoon 
Mujhey Dekhney Key Liye Uthte Hain
Miltey Hi Nazar Woh Jhukte Hain 
Sarey Jahan Main Aise Ankhain Nahi
Jin Ankhoon Pey Main Marti Hoon 
In Ankhoon Main Koi Ansoo Na Aye Koi
Kabhi Koi Gham Na Pass Aye Koi 
Sada Muskurate Rahain Yeh Ankhain
Har Dam Yeh DUA Main Karti Hoon 
Kiya Baat Hai Un Ankhoon Ke
Jin Ankhoon Pey Main Marti Hoon

st: Kyun Khud Ko Beqaraar Kiye Jaarahi Hoon Mein
s:
Kyun Khud Ko Beqaraar Kiye Jaarahi Hoon Mein
Kis Bewafa Ko Pyar Kiye Jarahi Hoon Mein
Aaya Kabhi Na, Aur Jo Na Ayega Phir Kabhi
Kyun Uska Intezar Kiye Jarahi Hoon Mein 
Jo Kisi Wafa Ke Naam Se Bhi Ashna Nahi
Uspar Hi Jaan Nisaar Kiye Jarahi Hoon Mein 
Poora Na Hoga Wada-E-Wafa Kabhi Magar
Danista Aitebar Kiye Jarahi Hoon Mein 
Ankhoun Ko Ashkbaar Kiye Jarahi Hoon Mein
Usko Mein Bhool Jaoun Ye Mumkin Nahi Magar 
Koshish Ye Baar Baar Kiye Jarahi Hoon Mein
Dena Naa Gair Ko Itni Jagah Qareeb Kabhi 
Dil Tujhko Baar Baar Hoshiyar Kiye Jarahi Hoon Mein
Ruswa Hui Hoon Aaj Jiske Pyar Me Mein 
Isko Bhi Sharmsaar Kiye Jarahi Hoon Mein

st: Aapki is dil lagi me hum apna dil kho baithe
s:
Aapki is dil lagi me hum apna dil kho baithe
Kal tak us khuda k the aaj apke ho baithe.
Pyar suna to tha diwana kr deta hai
Aaj khud krke hum bhi hosh kho baithe
Kyun tumhare is ashiq ka parwano me naam lete ho
Keh kar ke dil doge humari jaan lete ho.
Pata hai nahi rakh sakte hum apni dhadkano pe kaabu
Phir kyun humari mohabbat ka imtehan lete ho. *
Dil unke liye he machalta hai
Thokar khata hai or sambhalta hai.
Kisi ne is kadar kar liya dil par kabja
Dil mera hai per unke liye dhadkta hai.*
Mohabbat or mout dono hi
Bin bulaye mehmaan hote hai,
Kab aa jaye koi nahi jaanta.
Lekin dono ka ek hi kaam hai
Ek Dil le jati hai to doosri Dhadkan.*
Jab khuda ne tujhe banaya hoga
Ek aadha jaam to usne bhi lagaya hoga.
Aise hi nashili nahi teri aankhen
Jaam ka kuch asar to tere mein bhi aaya hoga.*
Aaj har ek pal khoobsurat hai
Dil main teri sirf teri surat hai.
Kuch bhi kahe ye duniya gum nahi
Duniya se jiada humko teri zarurat hai.
Kuch log zindgi me is kdar shamil ho jate hain
Agar bhulna chaho to or yad ate hain.
Bas jate hain wo dil me is kadar
Ke ankhen band kro to samne nazar aate hain.
Apko dekhkar ye nigah jhuk jayegi
Khamoshi har bat keh jayegi.
Pad lena in ankhon mei apne pyar ko
Apki kasam sari kaynaat wahi ruk jaegi.
Hum to pyaar k saudagar hain
Sauda sacha karte hai
Par jab aap jaise dost ho khariddaar
To hum muft me bhi bik jaya karte hain.
Hamari dastan use kaha kubul thi
Meri wafayen uske liye fizool thi.
Koi aas nahin lekin koi itna bata do
Maine chaha use kya ye meri bhool thi.
Tinka-2 tufan mein bikharte chale gaye
Tanhai ki gehraion mein utarte chale gaye.
Udte thay jinke sahare aasmano mein hum
Ek-ek karke sab bichadte chale gaye.
Fresh flowers are waiting to disturb u
Hot coffe waiting to taste ur lips
Sun, birds, cool air – all r looking
At ur window to say u Good morning
*Have nice day.*
Girl’s father- Main nahi chahta ki meri beti
Apni puri zindgi 1 gadhe k sath guzare.
Boyfriend- Bus, isiliye main use
Yaha se le jane aya hun
Unki ek yaad bechan kar jati hai
Har cheez me unki surat nazar aati hai.
Aisa hal kiya unhone pyar me hamara
Ke nind aati hai to ankhen bura maan jati hain.
Is dil ka ik arman hai
ik chand me hmari jaan hai.
Jise dur se dekhna to mumkin hai
Par milna kahan aasan hai.
Kyon ki hum to ik zameen hain
Arr Vo ik aasman hai
Behte aashkon ki zubaan nahi hoti
Lafzon mein mohabat bayaan nahi hoti.
Mile jo pyar to kadar karna
Kismat har kisi par maherban nahi hoti.
Ishq aisa karo ki dharkn mein bs jaye
Saans bi lo to khushboo usi ki aye.
Pyar ka nasha aankhon pe cha jaye
Baat kuch bi na ho pr nam usi ka aye.
Ek lamha jo baar baar satata hai
Na jaane yeh dil kya chahta hai.
Kaash aap hote hamari nazron k saamne
Par yeh kaash kaash hi reh jata hai.
Sache dil se karo fariyaad to
Duniya ki har ek cheez milti hai.
Jis par khuda ki rehmat ho jaye
Use kaanto me bhi khushbu milti hai.
Koi achi si saja do mujhko
chalo bhula do mujhko.
Tumse dosti tute us din maut aa jaye mujhko
dil ki gahraiyon se dua do mujhko.
Hating hundred right persons
may not even touch your heart,
but loving one Wrong person
will leave you a brokn heart
throughout ur life !!!
Shararat na hoti Shikayat na hoti
Nainon me kisi ke Nazakat na hoti
Na hoti bekarari Na hote hum tanha
Agar jahan me kambakht Ye mohabat na hoti
Na hote ye sapne Ye khwabon ki duniya
Kisi ko chahat ki Tamanna na hoti
Na julfo ki chaya Na phulon ki khushbu
Yadon me unki Ye rate na kat ti
Jo na hoti mohabat Ye ansu na hote
Dil bhi na khota Aj tanha na rota
Diwanon si apni Ye halat na hoti
Agar jahan me kambakht Ye MoHoBBaT na hoti.
Maths teacher to santa,if u had 1000Rs
in ur pocket and 1000Rs in d other pocket,
wat would u think ?
Santa: YEH PANT KIS KI HAI.
Na wakt hai itna ki sylabus pura kiya jae
na tarkib koi ki exam pas kiya jae.
Na jane kaun sa dard diya hai is padhai ne
na roya jaye aur na soya jaye.

st: Zindagi ke liye jaan zarori hai
s:
Zindagi ke liye jaan zarori hai
Jeene ke liye arman zarori hai
Hamare pass chahe kitna gum hoo
Bus dost ke chehre per muskan jaorori hai
Ab intezar ki adat si ho gayi hai
Khamosi 1 halat si ho gayi hai
Na sikwa na sikayat hai ksis se
Kyoun ki ab is tanhaee se mohabbat se ho gayi hai
Waqt or khusi tere hi gulam honge
Har pal or pehlon tere hi naam honge
Zara moud kar dekhna kahbi tum
Tere har kadam ke sath mere kadmo ke nisan honge
Na Peene ka sook tha na pilane ka sook tha
Hame to shirf najre milane ka sook tha
Per kya kare ham najre usi se mila baitehe
Jinhe najro se pilane ka sook tha
Jwani ko jindgi ka nikhar kehte hai
Patjhar ko jindgi ka mazdhar kehte hai
Azeeb dastoor hai duniya ka yaron
1 dhoka hai jise sab pyar kehte hai
Is do pal ki jindgi mai tanhaiee kyoun hai
Logo ko ham se rusawee kyoun hai
Is duniya mai insan ki kami nahi hai
Fir hamare sath hamari parchaee kyoun hai
Kagaz pe hamne jindgi likh di
Asoun se seech kar har khusi likh di
Dard jab hamra ubhra lafzo per
To logo na kha wah kya gajal likh di
. Duriya hi dilo ko najdeek lati hai
Duriyan hi 1 ddoze ko yaad dilati hai
Door ho ker bhi koi kitna kareeb hai
Duriya hi is baat ka ehsas dilati hai
Dil jeet le woh Zigar rakhte hai
Katal kar de woh nazar rakhte hai
Wada kiya hai kisi se hamesa muskurane ka
Warana hum bhi ankhon mai samunder rakthe hai..

st: Jaane yeh pyar hota kyon hai?
s:
Jaane yeh pyar hota kyon hai?
Naam kuch bhi khe lo par deta sirf dard hai yeh..
Ek tanhai..aur aansu ke siwa yeh deta kuch nahi,
Jaane yeh pyar hota kyon hai?
Pyar mein dil tutete dekh hame socha tha pyar kabhi na karenge,
Par tum hi to they jisne kaha tha, pyar kushiya deta hai,
Tum wahi ho na jo bich ra mein muh modgaye,
Bina mud ke dekhe ek baar hame uhi chod gaye…
Jaane yeh pyar hota kyon hai?
Kaha gayi tum ne kahi wo baaten..
Zindagi bar kushiya dene ke waade..
Sab pal mein bula diya tumne,
Ghero ko kya dosh dein, apna hokar rula diya tumne,
Jaane yeh pyar hota kyon hai?

st: Aisa nahi ki aap ki yaad aati nahi,
s:
Aisa nahi ki aap ki yaad aati nahi,
Khata sirf itni ki hum batate nahi,
DOSTI aap ki anmol hai hamare liye,
Samjte ho aap isliye jatate nahi.
——————————–
Mohabbat ka matlab intzaar nahi hota,
Har kisi ko dekhna pyar nahi hota,
Yu to milta hai roz mohabbat-e-paigam,
Pyar hai zindgi jo har baar nahi hota !!!
——————————–
Dekhi jo surat aapki
Ye dil bechara machal gaya
Rakhna hifajat se apni adaa ko
Adaa pe aapki ye dil ghayal ho gaya
——————————–
Ek pyari si kali thi jo phool ban gayi
Ek nanhi si muskan thi jo hasi ban gayi
Ye choti choti si mulakat ab toh pyar ban gayi
Aur aapka har pal saath toh jaise bahar ban gayi
——————————–
Hichkiyon se ek baat ka pata chalta hai
Ki koi hume yaad toh karta hai
Baat na kare toh koi gham nahi
Par Koi aaj bhi hum par apne
Kuch Lamhe barbad toh karta hai
——————————–
Nazrein mili toh laga jaise sapna
Pass dikhi toh laga koi apna
Dil ko aapse bas yehi hai kehna
Ki aapka pyar toh hai dil ka gehna
——————————–
Tammana-e-ishq to hum bhi rakte hain,
Kisi ke dil me hum bhi dhadakte hain,
Na jane woh kab milenge
jin ke liye hum roz tadapte hain.
——————————–
Palkon me qaid kuchh sapne hai,
Kuchh begane kuchh apne hai,
Na jane kya KASHISH he in khayalon mai
woh gair hoke bhi kitne apne hai.

st: Hello everybuddy,
s:
Hello everybuddy,
re if u people like it ,
hava ke saath badal jhoom raha tha ,
lagta hai pehla pyar hua tha ,
kuch deir ka aalam tha ,
ab ro raha tha .
sochta tha badal hava rukne wali hai,
baat mere bhi dil ki samajhne wali hai,
kuch deir ka aalam tha ,
ab ro raha tha.
sapno mein aayi thi dil mein samayi thi,
yehi baat kyo us se chupayi thi,
kuch deir ka aalam tha ,
ab ro raha tha.
tufaan ko aana tha ,usko(hava) to jana tha,
tanha badal ko rahna tha,
kuch aisa hi aalam tha,
ab to rona(barsaat) hi tha.
hava ke saath badal jhoom raha tha ,
lagta tha pehla pyar hua tha,
gaauurr se dekho,

st: Dil par nahin hota kaaboo kisika
s:
Dil par nahin hota kaaboo kisika
Dil kho jaaye to kya kare …
Dheeme se koi jaadoo chal jaaye
Aur pyar ho jaaye to kya kare?
Haule haule madham madham
Chaahaton ke silsile shuru hote hain
Is chaahat ko jo koi na rok paaye
Aur pyar ho jaaye to kya kare?
Kehte hain log ki pyar na karna
Pyar mein log deewane ho jaate hain
Lekin yeh deewangi hi jo lubhaane lage
Aur pyar ho jaaye to kya kare?
Madhhoshi mein dil ko paaya
Aur davaa na koi kaam aayee
Lekin madhhoshi ko jo koi manzil samjhe
Aur pyar ho jaaye to kya kare?
Dil ke darwaaje band liye hain
Ki dil mein na koi bas jaaye
Lekin yeh dil hi jo na rahe apna
Aur pyar ho jaaye to kya kare?
Samjhe to hain bahut kuch samajhna
Lekin jazbaaton ki hain kahan wajaah koi
Bewajaah jo koi bhaane lage
Aur pyar ho jaaye to kya kare?
Daavaa to hum bhi kar sakte hain
Ki pyar nahin karenge hum
Par pyar par kahan chalta hain zor kisika
Jo pyar ho jaaye to kya kare?
Chaliye, pyar se bekhabar ho jaate hain hum
Pyar nahin hume yeh soch lete hain hum
Lekin gar pyar basa rahe dil mein
To is pyar ka hum kya kare?
Bhoolne ko to hum pyar ko bhool jaaye
Pyar ke saath dekhe har khwab ko bhool jaaye
Lekin dil par kahan chalta hain zor kisika
Is dil ka kaho hum kya kare?
Dil par nahin chalta zor kisika
Dil kho gaya humaara ab hum kya kare
Dheeme se koi jaadoo chal gaya
Aur pyar ho gaya ab hum kya kare???

st: “Tabiyat apni ghabrati hai jab sunsaan raton mein, hum aise mein teri yaadon ki chaadar taan lete hain”
s:
“Tabiyat apni ghabrati hai jab sunsaan raton mein, hum aise mein teri yaadon ki chaadar taan lete hain”
“Ajab aarzoo anokhi talab hai, tujhee se tujh ko maangna chaahataa hoon”
“Maine mashook baharon mein tujhe dekha hai, chaandni raat ke sitaron mein tujhe dekha hai”
“Doori ke gham kuch aur siva ho ke rah gaye, hum unse kya mile ki juda hoke rah gaye”
“Hum paala muddaton pehloo mein, hum kuch bhi nahin, tumne dekha ik nazar aur dil tumhara ho gaya”
“Bhooli bisree chand ummidey, chand fasaaney yaad aaye, tum yaad aaye aur tumhaare saath zamaane yaad aaye”
“Dil dhadakne ka sabab yaad aaya, woh teri yaad thi ab yaad aaya”
“Mausam aayenge jaayenge, hum tumko bhool na paayenge”
“Na ji bhar ke dekha na kuch baat ki, bahut aarzoo thi mulakaat ki”
“Hazoor aap ka hi ehtaraam kartaa chaloon, idhar se guzraa tha, socha salaam karta chaloon”
“Ek kami thi Taj Mahal mein, hum ne teri tasveer laga di”
“Kasid ke aatey aatey khat ik aur likh chaloon, main jaanta hoon jo who likhenge jawaab mein”
“Dil ka veeranaa ho gaya lekin, ab bhi hai teri aarzoo is mein”
“Aur to kaun hai jo mujh ko tassalli deta, hath rakh deti hai dil pey teri baaten aksar”

st: Kabhi to ki hogi suraj ne chand
s:
Kabhi to ki hogi suraj ne chand
se mohabbat
Tabhi to chand mein daag hai,
Mumkin hai ki chand ne ki
hogi bewafai
Tabhi to suraj mein aag hai.
Hasin palo ko phirse abad kar rahe the,
Chand se aapki baat kar rahe the,
Dil ko bada sukun mila jaanke yeh,
Ke aap bhi hame yaad kar rahe the.

st: Abhi to dil main halki si
s:
Abhi to dil main halki si
Khalish mahsos hoti hay
Bohot mumkin hay kal is ka
Mohabbat naam ho jaye
Khayalon main yeh koun aya
Sitaroon ki chamak le kar
Mere shanoon pe bikhere hain
Yeh kis ki zulf k saye
Bohot mumkin hay kal is ka
Mohabbat naam ho jaye
Yeh kasi beykhudi hay
Dil main kaisa kaif chaya hay
Yeh meri jaagti aankhon main
Kaise khuwaab lahraye
Bohot mumkin hay kal is ka
Mohabbat naam ho jaye
Ruki hay zindagi ek
Muskarate moor pe a kar
Kaheen yeh muskarahat
Zindagi ka gham na ban jaye
Bohot mumkin hay kal is ka
Mohabbat naam ho jaye…

st: Kya pyaar mein aisa hota hai?
s:
Kya pyaar mein aisa hota hai?
Ke jisse dil chahe uss pe mar jaane ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ke aansoo pi jaane ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ke her ghum ko mitta dene ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ko her pal muskurrata hua dekhne ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss par zindagani lutta dene ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ka haath pakar kar urra le jaane ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ki aankhon mein kho jaane ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ki pyaari pyaari baaton ko her pal sun ne ko dil chahta ha?
Ke uss ko her khushi dene ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ko her aafat se mehfooz rakhne ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ke raaste mein gire hue her kaante ko utha dene ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ko dil mein chupaa lene ko dil chahta hai?
Ke uss ko her pal sapnon mein rakhne ko dil chahta hai?
Kya pyaar mein aisa hota hai?
Ke uss ki parchaayee ko hi dekh kar dil khush ho jata hai?
Ke uss ki ek nazar se hi dil ko sukoon aajata hai?
Ke uss ka chehra chaaron taraf chha jaata hai?
Ke uss ki baat baat par pyaar aajata hai?
Ke uss ki baahon mein dil mar jaana chahta hai?
Ke uss ke haathon ki lakeeron ko dil badal dena chahta hai?
Ke uss ke naseeb mein likha hua her ghum dil apne naam kar lena chahta hai?
Ke uss ki her khawaish ko dil pura kar dena chahta hai?
Ke saare jahan ki khushiyan dil uss ke kadmon mein bicha dena chahta hai?
Kya pyaar mein aisa hota hai?
Ke uss ke saath jeena to kya uss ke )saath mar jaane ko dil chahta hai?
Kya pyaar mein aisa hota hai..?

st: Aye Mohabbat tere anjam se rona aaya.
s:
Aye Mohabbat tere anjam se rona aaya.
Jane kyun aaj tere naam se rona aya,
Yu to her sham umid me guzar jati hain.
Aaj kuch baatein yaad aayi to sham pe rona aya.
Kabhi taqdir, kabhi matam,kabhi duniya ka gila,
Manzil-e-ishq k har kaam pe rona aya.
Jab hua zamane me mohabat ka zikr.
Mujhe apne dil-e-nakaam pe rona aya…

st: Khatam apni chahton ka silsila kaise hua
s:
Khatam apni chahton ka silsila kaise hua
Tu to mujh mein jazab tha mujh se juda kaise hua
Wo jo sirf tere aur mere darmiyan ek baat thi
Aao sochein shehar us se aashna kaise hua
Chubh gayin seeney mein tooti khawahishon ki kirchiyan
Kya likhun dil tootney ka haadsa kasie hua
Jo rang-e-jaan tha kabhi milta hai ab rukh phair kar
Sochta hoon iss qadar wo bewafa kaise hua…

st: MUHABAT KHOUF HOTI HAI !
s:
MUHABAT KHOUF HOTI HAI !
Kabhi Nadaan Karti Hai
Kabhi Heraan Karti Hai
MUJHE MALOOM HAI SHAYED !
Boht Nuksan Karti Hai
Ye Ghar Weeran Karti Hai
Jahan Hon Ronaqain Zinda
Wo Dil Sunsan Karti Hai
Mager Ab Sun Mere Humdam !
Mujhe Karni Muhabat Hai
Muhabat Wo Haqeeqat Hai !
Jo Dil Abaad Karti Hai
Sabhi Ko Shaad Krti Hai
Marron Ko Yaad Krti Hai
Muhabat Khouf Kab Se Hai
Muhabat Rog Kab Se Hai
Ye Marham Hai Maseeha Hai
Ye Deepak Hai Ye dia Hai
Chalo Acha Hua Jaana !
Gaya Main Jaan Ye Jaana !
Suno Phir Ghour Se Jaana !
Muje TumSe Muhabat Hai

st: Kya aap jante hai ?
s:
Kya aap jante hai ?
Prem ek meetha zahar hai.
Prem fursat ka vyapaar hai
Prem manavta ka dusra naam hai
Prem dilon ko kholne wali kunji hai.
Prem ishwariya soundarya ki bhook hai.
Prem samay aur isthan ki seema se dur hai.
Prem ek yesa divya pushp hai, jo kabhi nahi murjhata.
Prem ishwar ki den or jeevan ki madhurtam vastu hai.

st: Mujhe pata nahin kya ho jata hai,
s:
Mujhe pata nahin kya ho jata hai,
neend aati nahin or chain kho jata hai,
phir dil bechain ho jata hai,
or khwaab kuch aisa aata hai,
ki aap ka hath hamare hathon mein,
or sar hamare kandhe pe nazar aata hai…
-Manpreet Singh
Kya saza teri kya kasoor humara
Jannat jahan ko tune dojak ki aag se jalaya
Kaash teri aankhon ke vaade meri palko tak na baaste
Teri yaadon ki baarish sawaan ki tarah na barasti
Kaash khayalon ke dariya ko tum saahil na banate
Dil churake na dil todte to ye bebasi na hoti
Pyaar ke khel me teri jeet aur meri haar na hoti…
